analysis.key_quote: History will not forgive you if you fire these people, and do not convince yourself you don't care; you wouldn't be doing this much damage to the government if you didn't care about how you're seen in history.
analysis.rationale: The comment expresses strong opposition to the proposed rule by criticizing the administration's actions and suggesting that they undermine the integrity and effectiveness of the federal workforce. The themes of political decline and the negative impact on governance indicate a clear stance against the politicization of civil service.
